// Pivot 0, 0
int flipper[16] = {
	9, 2,
	22, 3,
	61, 43,
	61, 53,
	49, 53,
	3, 27,
	0, 14,
	6, 4
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flipper[16] = {
	0.142857f, 0.035088f,
	0.349206f, 0.052632f,
	0.968254f, 0.754386f,
	0.968254f, 0.929825f,
	0.777778f, 0.929825f,
	0.047619f, 0.473684f,
	0.000000f, 0.245614f,
	0.095238f, 0.070175f
